reviewText: This was exactly what I wanted and it came in great condition. I love watching this show. Thank you very much.

Once again, these guys made me laugh hard!! It's a great compilation of great moments, adventures really, that aired a few years ago (some of them are currently not available on dvd, the seasons, I mean). I strongly reccomend this DVD! You're gonna have a serious laugh!

Having just bought a Mazda RX 8 I wanted to see what Top Gear had to say in their review of the car. According to my researcc on the internet this was the package in which the car was reviewed. guess what ? it wasn't. I feel totally ripped of.

These guys are very intertaining. What they did to the Toyota truck was just outragious. I'm not a truck guy, but if I was I'd have to buy toyota at this point. The only thing wrong with TopGear is that there isn't more of it. The world would be a much more boring place without James, Richard and Jeremy.

My Husband & I love Top Gear (the UK series).  We love all the three lads... as it's like sitting on the sofa at home talking with your mates. This collection is informative, friendly and funny, what more can one say, other than please watch and enjoy.
